dmca.title: Web DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
Hi,

We are sorry to report that your members have posted images that breach the copyright of our World Guide sites.

Therefore, we wish to issue the following DMCA complaint;

1. MR. MARTIN TREASURE

2.The images copied are as follows:

http://choldisan.blogspot.co.uk/2009/04/yokohama.html
http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_0TQdZsQxmBQ/Ser8mSCvDrI/AAAAAAAAD9M/4qxb9I3nrm4/s1600-h/Yokohama_Tokyo.jpg
http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_0TQdZsQxmBQ/Ser8mSCvDrI/AAAAAAAAD9M/4qxb9I3nrm4/s200/Yokohama_Tokyo.jpg
http://kibris-haritasi.blogspot.co.uk/2011/09/ayia-napa-sehir-haritas.html
http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QFvwi8twsiI/TnHso7f6FJI/AAAAAAAAA20/JhJffahJZFM/s1600/Ayi_+Napa_%25C5%259Eehir_Haritas%25C4%25B1.jpg
http://kibris-haritasi.blogspot.co.uk/2011/09/lefkosa-sehir-haritalar.html
http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-a0gARVvQ6a0/TnFT_HwCEwI/AAAAAAAAA2Y/BT1zutzGpYU/s1600/Lefko%25C5%259Fa_%25C5%259Eehir_Haritalar%25C4%25B1.jpg
http://falconvoy.blogspot.co.uk/2011/02/dato.html
http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-6pEIqyKxsdc/TWImvsGcTcI/AAAAAAAAQuk/qZofgoVDGoY/s400/aAustraliaoccidental-Perth.jpg

3. The original images can be viewed here:

http://www.tokyo.world-guides.com/tokyo_maps.html
http://www.world-guides.com/images/tokyo/tokyo_city_map.jpg
http://www.ayia-napa.world-guides.com/ayia_napa_maps.html
http://www.world-guides.com/images/ayia_napa/ayia_napa_map.jpg
http://www.nicosia.world-guides.com/nicosia_maps.html
http://www.world-guides.com/images/nicosia/nicosia_map.jpg
http://www.adelaide.world-guides.com/adelaide_maps.html
http://www.world-guides.com/images/australia/australia_map_country.jpg

4.  Contact: [redacted] - director TravelSmart Ltd
Tel: +[redacted]
Email: info@world-guides.com
Address: [redacted], Frome, Somerset, England BA11 2DL

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by World Guides.

6. I hereby state under penalty of perjury that this information is accurate, and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the infringed materials.


Many thanks once again for your help, please advise if you require any further information.

I look forward to hearing from you shortly.

MARTIN
